Text:
BTW users. there shouldn be eny problem with the updatets for PowerAmp (originals) 

i still use it myself on my android and i havnt personally been having eny problems :) 

exept for downloads via Tubemate sometimes but just download some of it via your pc and convert it to .mp3 music format then the track works perfect :D

have fun ;)
